Title: BL-2 INSTRUMENTS
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on instruments

2.description: Autopilot mechanism inoperable - Bomb Run roll on Table O-6 -2

3.description: Landing gear indicator out - landing roll on Table G-9 -3

4.description: Intercom system out - Mission may be aborted
notes: All gunners now must roll a 6 to hit attacking fighters except Tail gunners which hit on 5 or 6
See rules section Aborting the Mission

5.description: Drop out of formation to 10,000 feet in next zone
notes: See rules sections Oxygen Out and Out of Formation

6.description: Wing flaps indicator out - landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1

7.description: Aileron controls out - landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1

8.description: Elevator controls out - landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1

9.description: Rudder controls out - landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1

10.description: Propeller feathering mechanism out - crew must immediately bailout Table G-6 in case of subsequent runaway engine result from Table BL-1

11.description: Engine fire extinguishers out - crew must immediately bailout Table G-6 if engine fire occurs

12.description: Electrical system out - crew must immediately bailout Table G-6

landing_modifiers.description: Most instrument damage affects landing difficulty
landing_modifiers.critical: Some results (electrical system) force immediate bailout

notes: If intercom system also out along with autopilot, Bomb Run is automatically off target
Landing roll modifications are cumulative with other damage
Propeller feathering and engine extinguisher damage create emergency bailout conditions
See rules sections for Oxygen Out, Aborting the Mission, and Out of Formation
